release.notes: fixed a minor issue where the installation failed because it was installing directly to /data/local/bin/ instead of going to /sdcard/com.wjholden.nmap/ then copying like the original design.
another minor bug that prevented proper installation because slashes weren't correctly being appended to directory names.
MAJOR bugfix, wasn't taking trailing '/' on /data/local/bin/ preventing proper installation on G-1.
removed all ads; thank you for your purchase! - makes sure worker threads only execute once and close correctly.
HUGE update - now works on non-rooted phones! Also nmap-mac-prefixes bug (should) be fixed now.
